texts.name: Liam
texts.biography: Liam has mastered the ways of taming the many flying beasts that inhabit The Glade. His call is usually the last thing you hear before talons dig into your skull.

specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Fairy Bears or Mystical Bears by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for 6 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Fairy Bears
